clinical_study.brief_title: Addition of Prednisolone and Heparin in Patients Undergoing IVF With Failed IVF Cycles
clinical_study.official_title: Addition of Prednisolone and Heparin in Patients With Repeated Implantation Failures: a Prospective Clinical Study

lead_sponsor.agency: National and Kapodistrian University of Athens

clinical_study.source: National and Kapodistrian University of Athens

brief_summary.textblock: The addition of heparin and prednisolone increases pregnancy outcome parameters in women undergoing In Vitro Fertilisation (IVF) with failed IVF cycles.

primary_outcome.time_frame: finding of a fetal heart at >6 gestational weeks / 2 years

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 2 years
through study completion, an average of 2 years
through study completion, an average of 2 years
through study completion, an average of 2 years
through study completion, an average of 2 years

arm_group.arm_group_label: Prednisolone and Heparin during COH for IVF

intervention.intervention_name: Prednisolone and Heparin during COH for IVF
intervention.description: Low Molecular Weight Heparin (LMWH) (Enoxaparin Sodium, Clexane, Sanofi-Aventis, Australia) at a dose of 1 mg/kg/day and 5 mg prednisolone p.os (Prezolon; Nycomed Hellas SA) were to be initiated on the first day of injections in both protocols until the pregnancy test. In cases of pregnancy, prednisolone and enoxaparin were to be continued up to the 12th and 34th week, respectively
intervention.arm_group_label: Prednisolone and Heparin during COH for IVF

intervention.description: Both GnRH agonists (long, starting at day 2 or 21) with Triptorelin acetate 0.1 mg (Gonapetpyl daily; Ferring, Kiel, Germany) and antagonists' with ganirelix 0.25 mg (Orgalutran; Organon, Oss, The Netherlands) or cetrorelix 0.25 mg (Cetrotide; Serono, Rome, Italy) protocols will be used; for ovarian stimulation both recombinant FSH (Puregon; Organon, Oss, Netherlands or Gonal F; Serono, Rome, Italy) and human menopausal gonadotrophin (Menopur; Ferring Pharmaceuticals, Langley, Berkshire, UK) will be used. Ovarian response will be monitored by ultrasonography, oocyte retrieval will be performed 36-38 hours after the hCG triggering and for luteal phase support 600 mg progesterone tablets (Utrogestan; Laboratoires Besins- Iscovesco, Paris, France) or gel 8% intravaginally (Vasclor; Verisfield Ltd, UK) will be applied.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- personal history of â‰¥2 failed IVF/ICSI cycles
- age <45 years
- availability of fresh ejaculate sperm for IVF/ICSI procedures
- confirmation of normal uterine cavity
- presence of good quality (Grade I or II) embryos for transfer
Exclusion Criteria:
- endocrine disorders
- immune disorders
- coagulation disorders
